title: I see, you see, we all see for an Iced T
content:
[http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/22241.html?cprose=7-11](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074446/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/22241.html?cprose=7-11 "http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/22241.html?cprose=7-11")

I couldn,t resist. What are your favorite tacky ice typefaces?
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content:
I'm a big fan of this one (from the label of a painting at the Musée d'Orsay):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074446im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2955.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074446im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_2954.jpg)
Being an ice-chewer myself, I have to thank you for posting the link to this article! :-) A great read!
